title: Witness to Auschwitz
creator_credit: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Robin Taylor
brief_description: This program describes the events behind the gates of Auschwitz using archival footage and photographs. This program documents the experiences of Rudolph Verba, one of the few to escape Auschwitz and co-author the report which unveiled the horror of the Nazi work camps.
